Title: Costs Lawyer Services
Description:
This Framework provides costs law services to the Public Sector as detailed in the Contract Notice Authorised Customer List.
This Framework replaced the previous (expired) Law Costs Draftsman Services (RM1675). The policy drivers supporting the development and procurement of this Framework are:
o Provide Buyers with a route to market compliant with EU regulations;
o Offer a simplified agreement for both Buyers and Suppliers;
o Be attractive to Small-Medium Sized Enterprises (SMEs); and
o Achieve value for money.
This Framework consists of 3 lots. Lot 1 - General Costs Law Services, Lot 2 - Clinical Negligence Specialist
Services and Lot 3 - Security Clearance Specialist Services.
The framework period is for 24 months with option to extend for 2 periods of 12 months.
The Supplier will provide services to Buyers in the jurisdictional area of England & Wales.
Contact Name: The Minister for the Cabinet Office acting through Crown Commercial Service

Title: Law Costs Draftsman Services
Description:
The CPS’ shared Commercial Service acting on behalf of the Government Legal Department (GLD) and HM Revenue & Customs  sought quotations from suppliers under the Crown Commercial Services framework for Law Costs Draftsman Services (RM1675 Lot 1 & Lot 2) to provide the services that meets the Department’s requirements.   

GLD/HMRC appointed suppliers with a proven track record in complex costs matters such as, high value immigration matters, high value and complex tax litigation cases and commercial costs claims. As well as the ability to provide Costs Lawyers or Costs Draftsmen to work on more routine costs matters.
